sentence: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"
It was almost as if the bee had caused them to be frozen in time.
They had no idea what to do and were completely at the whim of the bee force.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"
It was almost as if the bee had caused them to be frozen in time.
They had no idea what to do and were completely at the whim of the bee force.
They had never been aware of it before, but the process of a bee whispering into your ear was fairly uncomfortable.

The allergic man and his family were relieved to be able to live free of worry.
They fenced off the area and let the bees live in peace. This went on for many years to come until the great war of 2050.
As the bees grew in number, and as they were a part of the family now, they knew there was something that would threaten their way
. They decided to strike the family and kill half of all people.

They would finally have their freedom to rule over all that they could see.
